document_data.name: Aura of Vitality
document_data.mainbody: '''Aura of vitality''' was an [[evocation]] [[spell]] for [[druid]]s and [[paladin]]s that created an aura that could heal creatures close by.
document_data.Effects: The caster created an aura with a {{SI|30|ft}} radius that was centered on the caster. The caster could pick a creature within the aura to regain some lost health. The aura only lasted for 1 minute.
document_data.Components: This spell required only a [[Verbal component|verbal]] component.
